title: Definition of Differences Using Standard Deviation
text: Standard deviation measures, essentially, the average deviations a sample is from its sample mean. To calculate the value that is $$1.5$$ standard deviations below the mean then, therefore, we must calculate the value that is the mean minus $$1.5$$ times the standard deviation.
